26b1('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
26b2('bum): cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la ston pa de dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha
26b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de
26b4('bum): ltar de dag sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar
26b5('bum): rtag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs// brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyinang
26b6('bum): pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ tshul khrims
26b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
26b8('bum): phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
27a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi// 
27a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshulo khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes
27a3('bum): bya bar rtog pasashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ bzod pa'i pha ro lad tu phyind pa
27a4('bum): sdig bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ bzod pa'i pha ro// da lang tu phyi nad pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston da/ bzod pa pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing tau 'di
27a5('bum): snyed du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjed de/ su la bstand pa de dag/ kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
27a6('bum): 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang
27a7('bum): pa mya sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bapyod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa sdug bsngal la zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
27a8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ 
27b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs rnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag gi zhes go zhes bya bar bston pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes/ 
27b2('bum): bya bar ston/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar stond/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha
27b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal
27b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'a/ grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro
27b5('bum): de ltar de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rta// ga go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol// da tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson
27b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya b.rag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i
27b7('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag gro zhes bya bar stonang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston de/ bsam nyan/ 
27b8('bum): gi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar sto nang / bsam gtan gi pa ri mang tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stan cing / 'di skad du gang da ltar spyang po ni zhes rab kyi phar mang du phyin
28a1('bum): la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol de tu phyind pa sdug bsngal
28a2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag
28a3('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyi nad pa bdag
28a4('bum): myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha
28a5('bum): rimang tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ shes rab kyipha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar smon bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya
28a6('bum): bar stond/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas/ 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la
28a7('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag
28a8('bum): myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
28b1('bum): tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
28b2('bum): tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid
28b3('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog pa nang stong pa
28b4('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par rlung stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog/ nang stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog/ 
28b5('bum): pa dang / nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid de bdag myed ces bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid da myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
28b6('bum): phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ phyi stong pa
28b7('bum): nyid myi sdug gi zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod do/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog pa
28b8('bum): 'gyur ro/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid/ 
29a1('bum): ga nas bya tsug pa dang / bye snang pa nyid sdug bsngal pa zhes bya bar rdzog pa dang / skye stong pa nyid bdag myed de zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bya snang pa nyid myi sdug sanas bya bar rgyag
29a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro mad du phyinod pa'i gzugs brnyan pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ phyin stong pa nyid myi rtag ga zhes bya ba ston/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ skye nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do/ 
29a3('bum): bya bar ston/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya ba ro ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / phyi nang stong pa nyi
29a4('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ri// phyi nang stong pa nyid sdugabasngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi su
29a5('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rtag ces bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar
29a6('bum): rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa
29a7('bum): nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar sti ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mo sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha yang
29a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid su ma
29b1('bum): nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
29b2('bum): lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par/ 
29b3('bum): 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar ston/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
29b4('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod do zhes su lo bstan pa de dag kyang / chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
29b5('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya/ par rtog par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag
29b6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
29b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar stond/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag
29b8('bum): myed ces bya bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// zhes brjod de su la bstan pa de dag kyang / don dam pa stong pa
30a1('bum): rtag gnyis bya bar rtog par 'gyur / ngan sa pa spang pa nyid sdug bsngas skyes bya bar rtog par 'gyur/ dadangam thasangs nyid bdag myed nus bya bar rtag par 'gyur dedangapa
30a2('bum): stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag kI zhes bya ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal la zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed
30a3('bum): do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar
30a4('bum): ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ 'du rdzas byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad dug
30a5('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod// de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rta// ga ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
30a6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'dus byas sto
30a7('bum): bo nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes
30a8('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
30b1('bum): ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ 
30b2('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces
30b3('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'dus ma byas stong po nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug
30b4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
30b5('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stongapa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mtha
30b6('bum): las 'das pa ston po nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ mthulas 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang dri ltar skying pa ni shes rab kyi pha lang du ni
30b7('bum): pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
30b8('bum): 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mtha' las 'das pa ste// 
31a1('bum): pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa
31a2('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha mang tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyad par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go
31a3('bum): bA bar snyan/ zags dang pa ma skyed pa stong ba nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar sna dang / bogs dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stod/ thog ma dang ba mi myed pa stong pa nyid ma smras/ 
31a4('bum): zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes brjod de/ su bstan pa de dag kyang thog ma dong tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi/ 
31a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ theg ma dang tha ma myed pa/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog mad/ dab ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
31a6('bum): 'gyur ro// thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang ba ma myong ba stongs
31a7('bum): nying sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sdug go zhes bya ba rtog pas/ shes
31a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ dor ba myed pa stong
31b1('bum): nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la
31b2('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang / dor ba myed pa stong po nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag
31b3('bum): myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
31b4('bum): sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa ste/ rjed pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdig go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab
31b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur raro/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston// 
31b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston nga / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston / cong 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha ro la du phyind pa la spyod do/ 
31b7('bum): zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin
31b8('bum): stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
32a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
32a2('bum): phyi nang pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed do
32a3('bum): zhes bya bar stond/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / chos thams
32a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
32a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya b.rartog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed sdug bsngal lo zhes
32a6('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag skyed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la skyed par 'gyur/ 
32a7('bum): ring gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba stond/ 'angag mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stonang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
32a8('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtag par 'argya
32b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
32b2('bum): de ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
32b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ myi dmyigs pa
32b4('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes
32b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// zhes brjod de/ su la ba/ stand pa de dag kyang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces/ bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
32b6('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi
32b7('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes
32b8('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar stonang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar sto/ 
33a1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
33a2('bum): la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
33a3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes
33a4('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid pa/ dag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
33a5('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol da du phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
33a6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ste nang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mya sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
33a7('bum): tu phyi na pa la spyod do zhes bya bar brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
33a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid
33b1('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
33b2('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston na dngos po mye
33b3('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
33b4('bum): do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang dngos po myed/ pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyu/ ra ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya/ 
33b5('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyi tshad bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po rgya dpa'i ngo bo nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
33b6('bum): dgangs pa myed pa'i nga ba nyid mang sa nyid myirtag ga zhes bya bar rtag pa dang / dngas pa myed pa nga ba nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtag pa dang / dngos po myeng pa'ing sa nyid pang pa nyid pa sa
33b7('bum): skye nas bya ba gapa dang / pham pa myed pa sa nyid sdug gnyis ga pas/ sa kyi sung sa sbyin pa'i gzugs na sa spyod pa
33b8('bum): bzhag pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar stonang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar snyan/ dran pa nye bar ban
34a1('bum): mas kyi sdug gnas byu ba ga dang / 'di skad du gang de ltar snang ba ni/ shes rab kyi sa du sbyin pa la spyad du zhes 'arjod de/ sum ldan pa dag kyang / du ma
34a2('bum): rnams kyi rtag ga zhes bya ba rtog par 'gyur ro// drin pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ba dag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ra
34a3('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes
34a4('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
34a5('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rti// ga go zhes bya bar stond/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sdu/ ga bsngal lo zhes bya bar stonang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
34a6('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar stand/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mya sdug go zhes bya bar stonang / cing 'di skad du gang de ltar smyo nga pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod
34a7('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams
34a8('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtag par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par/ 
34b1('bum): spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
34b2('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu
34b3('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi rtag
34b4('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi
34b5('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag rdzu 'phrul ge rkang pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzo
34b6('bum): 'brum gi rkang pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dbang pa
34b7('bum): rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
34b8('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do te zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur
35a1('bum): dbang po rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dbang po rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams sdug
35a2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs rnyan la spyod pa
35a3('bum): 'gyur ro// stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
35a4('bum): cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams sdug bsngal
35a5('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams myi sdug ces bya// bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag stobs rnams mi rtag
35a6('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
35a7('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi ning pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston// byang chub gi yan lag rjes sdug sngale lo zhes bya bar stonang / 
35a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdog myed do zhes bya bar ston / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi ma du phyin pa ma spyod ngo zhes so
35b1('bum): de su la bstand pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed
35b2('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug sngal
35b3('bum): lo zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub gi yan lag rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 
35b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stona'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bad drug myong ngo zhes bya bar
35b5('bum): stonang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug go zhes byabar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod do// su la bstan pa de dag
35b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhi sa bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa'i lam yan mig brgyas
35b7('bum): bdag myed ces bya ba rtog par 'gyur ro/ 'phagos pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyu rdzo/ desar de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myin gago zhes bang tshun pa dzo
35b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myo sdig go zhes bya bar
36a1('bum): rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 
36a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la
36a3('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog/ 
36a4('bum): par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog/ par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug/ 
36a5('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bad/ ga myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
36a6('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bsam rten rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ bsam rten rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ bsam rten rnams myi sdug
36a7('bum): go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod do/ su le bstan pa de dag kyang bsam rten rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam rten rnams myi rtag
36a8('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam rten rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// bsam rten rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bsam rten rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bas// 
36b1('bum): gtan rnams sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam rten rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam rten rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
36b2('bum): 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di
36b3('bum): skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjid de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshad myed pa rnams myi rtog ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
36b4('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog por 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rjes
36b5('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan
36b6('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa rnams sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
36b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su
36b8('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
36b9('bum): par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtago zhes bya ba rtog
37a1('bum): gzugs myong bI snyos sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang gzugs myed pi smos pa 'dun bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i skyes myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab
37a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par tharadapra rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar
37a3('bum): pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi
37a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dgakyang rnam par tha rad pa rnaMs myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur/ rnam par tha ra pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
37a5('bum): 'gyur ro// rnam par tha dad pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog pa// ra 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar/ te/ rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi
37a6('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag myed do// zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi sdug go zhe/ 
37a7('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyos/ 
37a8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar stonang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi
37b1('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi
37b2('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces/ 
37b3('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya ba
37b4('bum): rtog pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar
37b5('bum): rtog pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ron rnam par thar
37b6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi rtag go zhe sa bye bar stand/ rnam par tha rang pa'isgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba
37b7('bum): ston da/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
37b8('bum): myo sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam par tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myong ba
38a1('bum): smon pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
38a2('bum): dang / mtshan mi myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par ba ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mo myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag nas
38a3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
38a4('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshon ma myed pa dang / smon pa myi da pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi sdug
38a5('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs pa rnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal
38a6('bum): lo zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya ba ra stond/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol de tu/ 
38a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod de zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par
38a8('bum): shes pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag mngon par shes pa rnams myi rig go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa
38b1('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan
38b2('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston da/ ting nge 'dzin rnams myi sdug go zhes bya
38b3('bum): bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzinang rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug snga
38b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams myi sdug ces bya bar to/ ga par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtag go zhes
38b5('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog/ pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa/ dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab
38b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed do zhes bya
38b7('bum): bar stonang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces/ 
38b8('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
39a1('bum): de ltar de dag gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs
39a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston// de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
39a3('bum): stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stan cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
39a4('bum): spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs na mas myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
39a5('bum): stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog/ par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug ces
39a6('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'o stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshes
39a7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa da/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog pas shes kyi pha ro la tu kyai ra pa 'i gzugs nad la spyod rnams myi rtag go zhes bya ba
39a8('bum): ston pa dang / mas pad+ma dA ts+tshamra rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stonas dang / phre gas pa'i skyabs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa dang / myi 'ja
39b1('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag
39b2('bum): kyang / myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ 
39b3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ge zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi 'jig sa
39b4('bum): rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnam sa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 
39b5('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar/ stonang / so so yang dge par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
39b6('bum): bor ston da/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
39b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog pa
39b8('bum): 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
40a1('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par/ 
40a2('bum): rig pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba
40a3('bum): stonang / snying rje chen po bdag myed do zhes bya bar stonang / snying rje chen po mye sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyad de zhes brjod de/ su la bsgom
40a4('bum): de dag kyang / snying rje chen po mye rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snyi nga rje chen po bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje
40a5('bum): po mya sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag snying rje chen po/ myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po bdag myed do zhes/ 
40a6('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'a gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag go zhes
40a7('bum): bya bar stonang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stonang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi sdug/ 
40a8('bum): go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur/ 
40b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi
40b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas
40b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pe'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 
40b4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar ston/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
40b5('bum): 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar skyo nyer ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu kyi
40b6('bum): tshig ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdig bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i / 
40b7('bum): 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur / de ltar de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu kyi rtag ga zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal so nas rgya rtog pa dang / g+hu tu
40b8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ 
41a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya ba ston
41a2('bum): phan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'bras
41a3('bum): bu myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug sAl ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lan cig tu ri 'di
41a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa
41a5('bum): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya// bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go// zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
41a6('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go/ zhes bya bar ston/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar sto/ nang / 
41a7('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ 
41a8('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdud// 
41b1('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do/ 
41b2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas gshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston de
41b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
41b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid
41b5('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyi/ da myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag pa/ gra bcom pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
41b6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ga/ zugs
41b7('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub kyi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
41b8('bum): cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjid de/ su la bstanang pa de dag kyang / rang byang chub myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub sdug bsngal zhes bya
42a1('bum): par rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rang byang chub myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa
42a2('bum): dang / rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtag pa dang / rang byang chub bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ 
42a3('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ lam gyi/ 
42a4('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
42a5('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pani de sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi
42a6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya/ 
42a7('bum): bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur// 
42a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sdug bsngale lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa
42b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
42b2('bum): nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam
42b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sdug bsngal lo// 
42b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
42b5('bum): tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan to/ ke'u shi ka gau zhen yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
42b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/ 'di ltar ston te rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / 
42b7('bum): po lnga gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dngo sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyurgyad pa dang sa rgo ba deng sa bcu pa la gnas
42b8('bum): par 'gyur// chur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpo'i sa dang po le gnas par 'gyur na
43a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa 'dun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gas
43a2('bum): par 'gyur ro// chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa dang pa
43a3('bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang sa rku ba dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ na tshur
43a4('bum): rigs ga bu khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shi ga/ khyod gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// 
43a5('bum): sa gnyis pa dang sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang sa brgyad pa dang / sa rku ba dang sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// nur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
43a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa
43a7('bum): gnyis pa dang / so gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang sa rku ba dang sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i/ 
43a8('bum): pha rol de tu phyind po sgoms shig/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang so gsum
43b1('bum): pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang sa lnga pa dang sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa rku ba dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes de tsam yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
43b2('bum): stond te/ de dus kyi 'du shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgoms par 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di ltar stond te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
43b3('bum): gzugs brnyan to/ ke'u sha ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di
43b4('bum): ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang / nyon thos kyi
43b5('bum): sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'/ bar 'gyur ro zhes stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan to// ke'u shi
43b6('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub se mas dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur
43b7('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
43b8('bum): myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis de ltar myi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/ de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
44a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang phu dud dang / mchod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
44a2('bum): bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/ 'di skad stond te/ rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub
44a3('bum): par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med gangs med pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// zhes zer te ta rigs kyi bu 'ami rags kyi bu mo de dag ston na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a4('bum): phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan stond to/ kau'u shi ka gzhan yang rig sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i the ga pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston/ 
44a5('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da lta// ra byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa/ 
44a6('bum): nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gi dge ba'i rtsi ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te rjes su da ga' bar bgyis la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
44a7('bum): yongs su sngos shig/ ces rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag de ltar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin de pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// brgya byin gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston
44a8('bum): na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
44b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
44b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhi
44b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi
44b4('bum): dmyigs so// de la gzugs nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa ga la yod ces stend te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i gzugs
44b5('bum): brnyan myi stonang ngo // ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rig/ sa kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin
44b6('bum): 'di ltar stond te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni rang bzhi
44b7('bum): gis stong ste/ tshor bI rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gang yin pa de la ni n+yo ba rtag pa'o
44b8('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la tshor ba nyid kyang myi ngan/ rtag pa myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stonang te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stonang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du ni
45a1('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
45a2('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis spong
45a3('bum): ste/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni 'du shes rtag ces bya
45a4('bum): ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la 'du shes nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar sten po'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
45a5('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston te/ ke'u shi / ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang / chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
45a6('bum): de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond to// tshur ri gas kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgoms shig/ 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ 
45a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ 'du byed gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa/ 
45a8('bum): tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtog ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la 'du byed nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
45b1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan mya ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
45b2('bum): mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stonang te// chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i
45b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
45b4('bum): tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rta ga ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mye dan/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi/ 
45b5('bum): ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub seMs
45b6('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi// pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ myig myi rtag ces bya/ 
45b7('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ myig gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ 
45b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni myig myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la myig nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
46a1('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
46a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rna ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta zhig/ de
46a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang
46a4('bum): yin pa de la ni rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyig sa so// de la rna ba nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta gal yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'o/ 
46a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzu gus brnyan myi stond do// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
46a6('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stinang te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgoms shig/ sna mi rtag ces bya bar yang
46a7('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
46a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni sna rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la sna nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces skyon+da d+yen+ya ke'u shI ka da ltar ston pa ni
46b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
46b2('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ltar ston te/ chu ri rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa sgoms shig/ lha mu rtag ces bya bor yang dag par rjes sum
46b3('bum): lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol / 
46b4('bum): tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni lce rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de lce nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
46b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzug/ si mya stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rig gas kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
46b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar sto nad te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lus rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu
46b7('bum): ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
46b8('bum): tu phyi nad pa gang yin pa de ni lus rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la lus nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces bya ba ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu
47a1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan du mi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
47a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgoms shig/ yid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir
47a3('bum): zhe na/ yid ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ yid gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de ni
47a4('bum): yid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la yid nyid kyang med na rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba lta ga da la yod ces stonang te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
47a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am gas gi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'o/ 
47a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig
47a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa nga ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po myong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
47a8('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// dri la gzugs nyid kyang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka da ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
47b1('bum): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shI kra gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs gi bu mo de dag la
47b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ sgra mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra ni rang bzhini/ 
47b3('bum): gis stong ste/ sgra'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni sgra rtag ces bya ba'am/ 
47b4('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la sgra nyid kyang myong na myi rta ga pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
47b5('bum): tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha ro// 
47b6('bum): tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ chu ri rags kyi bu khyod kyis shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ dri mya rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni rang
47b7('bum): bzhin gis stong ste/ dri'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de la dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med po gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha ral du phyi nang pa gang yin pa de la ni dri rtag ces
47b8('bum): ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la dri nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48a1('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
48a2('bum): tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ ro myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ro'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa
48a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni ro rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la ro nyid kyang mying na rtag pa 'am myi rtag/ 
48a4('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stonang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya nang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
48a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyis
48a6('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ reg rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rog ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ reg gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de la
48a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de ni reg rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs// de la
48a8('bum): reg nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi kra de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// 
48b1('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi
48b2('bum): bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ chos myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin gang
48b3('bum): yin pa de la dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni chos rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
48b4('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la chos nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ste/ na pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi
48b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chu ba sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma
48b6('bum): de dag lnga shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skams shig/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
48b7('bum): ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gos stong ste/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin po de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myong ba gang yin pa de ni
48b8('bum): rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gang yin pa de la ni myig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigaso// de la myig gi rnam par shes pa nya
49a1('bum): myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka/ 
49a2('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
