96b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gi khams byung bu'i sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog dang
96b3('bum): gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis gi 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur to/ byang chub
96b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rigs gi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan
96b5('bum): yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems
96b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs gi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo la la zhig gis
96b7('bum): de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis gi 'jig rten
96b8('bum): gi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur po lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gi sems
97a1('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs gi bu 'am rigs gi bu
97a2('bum): mo la la zhag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang de'i nang nas
97a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu bum rigs gi bu mo la
97a4('bum): la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gsu
97a5('bum): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi lnga ga par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re ni
97a6('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sem sa can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
97a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs gi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par
97a8('bum): phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngonas
97b1('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'tshal rigs gi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ 
97b2('bum): bsod nams che se mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nges pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhol zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyi
97b3('bum): nub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas na/ de dag la gdod na/ ras bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/ 'di ni 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis baH
97b4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das jiHji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub
97b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi
97b6('bum): de lta de ltar bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// dri lta de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// ji lta de ltar bsam te
97b7('bum): gi phar ming du phyin pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de ste de ltar gas rab kyi pha rom tu phyin dpal bangams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rje lA ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
97b8('bum): chen pos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar nang stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstanapa
98a1('bum): bgyi'o de de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar chen po stong
98a2('bum): pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bdams shing rje su bstan pa
98a3('bum): bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la padams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bdam sa shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar thog ma
98a4('bum): dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang bzhini stong pa nyid
98a5('bum): la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ba/ 
98a6('bum): shing rje su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rje su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta
98a7('bum): ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
98a8('bum): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la bdams
98b1('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// dbang po rnams la bdams shing rje su bstan par bgyi'o// stobs rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan
98b2('bum): byang chub gi yan lag rnams la bdams shing rje su bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bdes
98b3('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// bsam gtan rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// tshad med pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
98b4('bum): 'jug pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rnam dpar tha rad pa brgyad dul rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// mthar gi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bdams shing
98b5('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid nga// mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la bdams shing rje/ sa su bstan par bgyi'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la/ 
98b6('bum): bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// gzungs gi sgo rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
98b7('bum): stobs rnams lha rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// 
98b8('bum): byams pa chen po la padams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// snying chen po la padams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bdams shing rjesu bstan par bgyir
99a1('bum): 6/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nang gi rkyen sman dang / yo byad gis kyang rjes su bzung bar bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chos gi bsdu dang / zang zing gi/ 
99a2('bum): bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel gi rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snga ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
99a3('bum): yong ye 'di ltar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdams shing rjes su bsten pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind la bdams shing rjes
99a4('bum): su bstan pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa la bdams shing rjesu bstan pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdam sa shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa
99a5('bum): la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la bdams shing
99a6('bum): rjes su bstan pa'i/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa 'o// don dam pa
99a7('bum): stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
99a8('bum): nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdas
99b1('bum): shing rjes su bstan pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bladams shing rjes su
99b2('bum): bstan pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa/ 
99b3('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dbang
99b4('bum): po rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// stobs rnams labadams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// byang chub gi yan lag rnam das la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam
99b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bas ma rtan rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// tshad med pa
99b6('bum): rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa/ 
99b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la bdams
99b8('bum): shing rjes su bstan pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// gzungs gi sgo rnams la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bdems shing rje su bstan/ 
100a1('bum): pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la padams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// byams pa chen po la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// snying rje
100a2('bum): chen po la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de lta
100a3('bum): khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la mos pa skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs so legs so// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du
100a4('bum): bya'o// 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa skyed
100a5('bum): bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang chos gi/ sa phan 'dogs pas phan btags shing yongs su bskyang b.rabya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan rdzas
100a6('bum): gi dag 'dun ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las byung ngo // gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems myi skye
100a7('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha lang tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha lang du phyin pa dang / bas/ 
100a8('bum): gtan ga pha rol du phyin pa dang / pha tshul tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen tha stong pa nyid dan dam
100b1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
100b2('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
100b3('bum): nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
100b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam rtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i ste/ mas par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
100b5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
100b6('bum): dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa
100b7('bum): yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/ 
100b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yod par myi 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod/ 
101a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob la/ nang stong pa nyid da
101a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
101a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
101a4('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / 
101a5('bum): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rna mas dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'pha gas pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam rten rnams dang / tshad myed
101a6('bum): pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang sman
101a7('bum): pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs/ 
101a8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang slob pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag
101b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chang bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur
101b2('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha yan gi rigs rnams yongs su 'drib par 'gyur ro// lha'i ris kyang mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten
101b3('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs gi lha
101b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
101b5('bum): bor 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar// 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams 'jig rten// du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris gi lha rnams 'jig rten du
101b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gi lha rnams 'jig rten du
101b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lce rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang / 
101b8('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
101b9('bum): bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
102a1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'bras bu me ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi gdung ba'i sgralha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
102a2('bum): 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam mkhan
102a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched gi lha rnams 'jig rten du/ 
102a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mche nga gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshul khrims
102a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzo da pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
102a6('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'dra// / 
102a7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// don dam pa stong
102a8('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
102b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 
102b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
102b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
102b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs
102b5('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i// lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'pha/ 
102b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam rten rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dun
102b7('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par bar
102b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
103a1('bum): nga dag par rig pa pani 'jig can du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sto chem 'jig rted du 'byung bar 'gyur / sangs rgyas kyi sem 'al pa brgyad ngag tan du gyul
103a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rang sangs rgyas gi lag pa 'jig rtedan du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gas rab kyi pa mang du phyin pa snang phrag brgyas stsal
103a3('bum): bam po// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che pa rnams pas gnas tan rab 'gyur las smos pa/ btsun pa rab 'phyir/ 
103a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi ru ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i
103a5('bum): dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mang du byas te/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi/ 
103a6('bum): rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i rings pa dang / nu
103a7('bum): khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dag las te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi ring ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngo / 
103b1('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o phul/ 
103b2('bum): zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya'o// myi mnyam dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
103b3('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni bdag dul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya
103b4('bum): ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar ga nus pa ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
103b5('bum): rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub gi yan lag rnam/ sa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag sa pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
103b6('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
103b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug kyang bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi
103b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang na yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams na/ 
104a1('bum): dang thun mong du byas shing / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
104a2('bum): chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs gi 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed chad myed pa dag gis 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas
104a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho phyogs gi 'jig rten go khams grangs myed chad myed dpag tu skyed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rerer la
104a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag/ 
104a5('bum): tu myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyasabacom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan la/ sa 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / byang phyogs gi 'jig rten gyi
104a6('bum): khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / byang shar gi phyogs
104a7('bum): 'tshams gi 'jig rte ni ga khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams gi 'jig rten gi khas
104a8('bum): grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho nub kyi phyogs/ 
104a9('bum): grangs med tshad med dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig khams
104b1('bum): 'tshams gi 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa re
104b2('bum): ngag dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed tshad med dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongasu mya
104b3('bum): ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / 'og gi phyogs gi 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad
104b4('bum): myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed tshad myedapa dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas
104b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa dag yongs su mya nga/ na las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed pa nang/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
104b6('bum): par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gi dam pa'i chos nub par gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa
104b7('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos gi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
104b8('bum): dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa myed pa dag dang / mi ngan las 'di slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa myed pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
105a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gi phung po dang / shes rab gi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grog
105a2('bum): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs myed tshad myed pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang chos
105a3('bum): bstan pa de la bslabs shing / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob pa/ 
105a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ 
105a5('bum): de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog/ gtso bo dam pa rab phul/ gya nom pa/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ mnyam pa myed
105a6('bum): ba myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla/ 
105a7('bum): na myeng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
105a8('bum): pe des de skad du smras te/ sems can gi rnam pa de ltar yongasu bsngos na/ dmyigs pa gang dang dngos po gang gis sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag rigs gi bu de dag rigs/ 
105b1('bum): ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmyigs su yod pa yin nam/ byams pas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang rigs gi bu mo de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas
105b2('bum): te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du dngos po de dag dang dmyigs pa de dag dmyigs su yod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar das
105b3('bum): po myed pa de dag dmyigs pa de dag myed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na bzhugs pa dri dag dang / de dag gi thugs dang po skyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i rna
105b4('bum): bar gau dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi the dag pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / slob pa rnams gi dge ba'i sku
105b5('bum): ba gang ji snyed pa rnams dang / myi slob pa rnams gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsogs pa bcu sa te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan ma'i/ 
105b6('bum): tshul gis yongs su bsngos na/ ji ltar myi rtog pa'i la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang // sdug bsngal la bde zhes bya bar 'du shes
105b7('bum): phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / bdag myeng ba la bdag ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang myi rtsang
105b8('bum): la rtsang bar 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ltar de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyurd tam/ de ltar yin la thams cad dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmyigs pa
106a1('bum): lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin/ tshul khrims gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol du phyin
106a2('bum): pa dang / bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa 'ang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'ang de bzhin/ myig dang rna ba dang sna dang / 
106a3('bum): lce dang lus dang yid kyang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg dang chos kyang de bzhin/ khams dang skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong
106a4('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyi da stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
106a5('bum): de bzhin 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'a// ngas pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa s+ho// nga pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
106a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 
106a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams
106a8('bum): kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub gi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa yang de bzhi
106b1('bum): bsam rten rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'du// 
106b2('bum): brgu yang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs gi sgo rnams
106b3('bum): kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de bzhin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin
106b4('bum): gal te dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmyigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin
106b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu/ phyin pa yang de bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de
106b6('bum): bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi ste nga pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
106b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de
106b8('bum): bzhin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
107a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dz+ra/ 
107a2('bum): kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub gi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de/ 
107a3('bum): bzhin/ bsam rten rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par thar da pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
107a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa yang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs kyi sgo/ 
107a5('bum): rnams kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de/ bzhin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin/ so so yang dag pa/ rig pa yang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
107a6('bum): kyang de bzhin/ yin na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/ dmyigs pa de ni ga nga zhig yin/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni gang zhig yin/ sems
107a7('bum): de ni gang zhig yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag ni gang zhig yin/ byams pas smras pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
107a8('bum): rim phyin drug la spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid gis stong pa'i chos thams cad la slob pa de dag ni
107b1('bum): gas dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dgA dang / rjes su ye 'dus dang ldan pa'i babadurnams bya ba'i ngas pa de dgas can sa rgyas shing/ blan mye
107b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsnga'i/ de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste gnyis gi tshul gis ma yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis ma yin no// mtshan ma'i tshul gis ma yin no// mchin
107b3('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gis ma yin na/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin na/ dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul gis ma yin na/ nyon mongs pa'i tshul gis ma yin no// rnam par byang ba'i tshul gis ma yin no// skye ba'i
107b4('bum): tshul gyis ma yin no// 'gag pa'i tshul gis ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa'i de dag pha rold tu phyin pa drug la 'dang spyod pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed
107b5('bum): pa yang ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa yang ma yi na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongs su zin pa yang ma yi na/ rang gi mtshan nyid gis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslab
107b6('bum): bar gyur pa yang ma yin no// de dag ni dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
107b7('bum): de dag dang mtshan mar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos par 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs
107b8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi
108a1('bum): pa de ltan po stan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshadad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni zag pa la gas du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa
108a2('bum): mdun du mi bshad de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ sbyin pa'i phar lang tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la
108a3('bum): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg/ 
108a4('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gas/ ra du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// stong pa
108a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs/ pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// chen po stong pa/ nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
108a6('bum): dpa'i mdun du mi bshad de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni thag pa la gsar du zhugs
108a7('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mi bshad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de
108a8('bum): bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi
108b1('bum): bshang // dor ba med pa stong ba nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ rang bzhini stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ 
108b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad da/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid da ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid de ltar ba
108b3('bum): pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa'i theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad de/ 
108b4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa lags dar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
108b5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dngos po mya dpa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gas du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dran pa
108b6('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub so/ 
108b7('bum): dpo'i mdun du mi bshad do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// dbang po rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
108b8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// stobs rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams de ltar bstan pa ni ba// 
109a1('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun s+ya/ 
109a2('bum): bshad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// bsam tan rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
109a3('bum): chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// tshang myed pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad de/ gzugs myong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams de la
109a4('bum): bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// rnam par thar pa brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad
109a5('bum): mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstan pa/ ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ma dun du myi bshad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
109a6('bum): ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mdun du ma bshad do// mngon par shes pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
109a7('bum): sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ gzungs gi sgo rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du
109a8('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi de lta
109b1('bum): bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dumi bang
109b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gas du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// thams cad shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i
109b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
109b4('bum): bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang / 'i mdun du mi bshad do// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i tshe sa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa
109b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de la dad pa 'am dga' ba tsam 'am/ mos pa tsam 'am/ gu sa pa tsam zhig yod pa de yang myed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ 
109b6('bum): phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdun du bshad cing bstan to// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongs su zin pa dang / sngon gi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
109b7('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa 'di bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar/ 
109b8('bum): bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// 1de'i mdun du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bsha
110a1('bum): ga par bya'o bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du
110a2('bum): nad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// de'i mdun du chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par phyin
110a3('bum): de'i mdun du don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du 'dus ma byas stong
110a4('bum): nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
110a5('bum): de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya// 'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du rang gi mtshan nyid de ltar bstan pa
110a6('bum): bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du chos thams cad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// 'i mdun du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// 
110a7('bum): bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i du
110a8('bum): du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bshad pa bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams de ltar bsta
110b1('bum): pa za shad par bya'o/ bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du yang dag par spong ba rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bstan ze ba shad par bya'o/ pa/ 
110b2('bum): bar bya'o// de'i mdun du dbang po rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du stobs rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du byang chub gi yang
110b3('bum): lag rnams bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
110b4('bum): de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mi/ dun du bsam gtan rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// debaston par bya'o// de'i mdun du tshad med pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ba
110b5('bum): par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du gzugs myed pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du rnam par tha rad pa brgyad de ltar bstan
110b6('bum): pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
110b7('bum): ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du mngon par shes pa rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du ting nge 'dzin rnams de
110b8('bum): ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du gzungs gi sgo rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de ltar bstan pa
111a1('bum): pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du myi 'jigs pa bzhi de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi de ltar bstan pa bshad
111a2('bum): par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du snying rje chen po de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o/ 
111a3('bum): bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du thams cad shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// 
111a4('bum): dede'i mdun du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshang bar bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du rang gi mtsha na nyid stong pa nyid gi chos rnams de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// 
111a5('bum): bstan par bya'o// des ni de thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag pa ra myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
111a6('bum): bya ba'i dngos po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// rab 'byor gis smras pa/ byams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ 
111a7('bum): thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i sems de ni zad cing 'gags la myed de/ rnam par gyurapa/ dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag dang / 
111a8('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang zad cing 'gags la myed de/ rnam par gyur pa rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de ni gang zhig/ dngos po de dag ni gang zhig/ dmyigs pa de dag ni gang zhig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag / 
111b1('bum): nigang zhig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ ci sems kyis yongs su bsngo 'am/ de ltar sems gis sems yongs su bsngo mni sems gnyis 'grogs/ 
111b2('bum): shing 'phrad par 'gyur ba myed de/ sems gi rang bzhin gang yin gang yin pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
111b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed do// bzod
111b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshul khrims gi pha rold tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi na pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// 
111b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid
111b6('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa 'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa ste// 
111b7('bum): pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dang
111b8('bum): po myed pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos
112a1('bum): myed pa'i dron pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dngos pa myed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi nang pa rnams ni ngom pa myed pa'o// bang pornams mangs brgyan
112a2('bum): stobs rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// byang chub gi yan lag rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dngos po myed ba'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dngos po med pa 'o can
112a3('bum): gtan rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshad myeng pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams ni dngos po snyed pa'o// mthar
112a4('bum): gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dngos myed pa'o// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa nga smon pa myed pa ni dngos po myed pa'i// mngon par shes pa rnams
112a5('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa
112a6('bum): bzhi ni dngos po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dngos po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po ni dngos po myong ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dngos po myed pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
112a7('bum): bu ni dngos po myed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po myed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang byang chub ni dngos po med pa'o// lam gi rnam
112a8('bum): bshes pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na myed pa yang dag
112b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis gnas rten rag/ 
112b2('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa rab 'byor nga theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par myi 'gyur ram/ btsun par
112b3('bum): 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ji ltar na des rjes su yi rang ba dang / 
112b4('bum): ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bzung zhing bla na mye dad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gis byang chub sems dpa'
112b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la dmyigs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenaH
112b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ bsam rten gi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam
112b7('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmyig
112b8('bum): ba'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ 
113a1('bum): rdul khrims kyi pa rnam tu phyin pa la snang ci/ tshul khrims kyi pha mang du phyin pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshanam myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ sbyin pa'i tha mam du rdzun pa
113a2('bum): spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pa mang du phyin pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ dang sbyang pa nyid la spyod cing nang stong pa nyid du mad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / blatshan mi myed pa/ 
113a3('bum): tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang mya dmyigs
113a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ stong pa nyi nga stong pa nyid la spyod cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi myi gas pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ 
113a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing chen po stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid do yang myi/ 
113a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin
113a7('bum): par byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / mtha'
113a8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de yang mi dmyigs pa'i chu
113b1('bum): dang mtshan ma skyed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ rang bzhin sas
113b2('bum): nyid la spyod cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gris 'dzin par byed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs
113b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs po'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par
113b4('bum): byed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing dngos po
113b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma me/ da pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la/ spyod cing ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 
113b6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par
113b7('bum): byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing yang dag par spongs
113b8('bum): de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshon ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzir
114a1('bum): bar byed/ dbang po rnams la spyod cing / dbang po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ stobs rnams la spyod cing stobs de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i
114a2('bum): tshu la dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing / byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ 'phags
114a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing 'phag
114a4('bum): pa'i bden pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ bsam rten rnams la spyod cing / bsam gtan de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
114a5('bum): gas 'dzin par byed/ tshad myed pa rnams la spyod cing / tshad med pa de da ga kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas
114a6('bum): spyod cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jig pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ rnam pa ra thar pa rnams la spyod cing / rnam par tha rad pa de dag kyang myi dmyig/ 
114a7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 
114a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod cing / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa de dag kyang myi
114b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ 
114b2('bum): dring nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin de dag myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ gzungs gi sgo rnams la spyod cing / gzungs gi sgod dag kyang mya dmyigs pa'i tshul
114b3('bum): mtshan ma myong ba'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gos 'dzin par byed/ myi
114b4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing / mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa da'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ so/ so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing / so so yang dag par
114b5('bum): rig pa bzhi la spyod cing myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gi/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ snying rje chen po la spyod cing / snying rje chen po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i
114b6('bum): tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed
114b7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing / thams cad shes pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing / lam gi rnam pa shes pa/ 
114b8('bum): nyid de dag kyang myi dmyigs po'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gis 'dzin par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshanas
115a1('bum): myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa
115a2('bum): mang ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / tshul khrims gi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 
115a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 'dus byas
115a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma mos pa mang ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos bA rang mang ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lams pa mang ba da / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / da ba skye
115a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / myi dmyigs pa sto/ 
115a6('bum): pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang po dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa ma' ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mos
115a7('bum): mang ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / dbang po rnams lams pa mang ba dang / stobs rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub gi yan lag rnams
115a8('bum): la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / chang med pa rnams la mos pa mang ba
115b1('bum): gzugs myed pa snyoms par 'dug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / mthang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par bar ba'i sgra spang pa nyid dang man
115b2('bum): ma skyed pa dang sman pa med pa lams pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams la mos pa sang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sa
115b3('bum): mos pa mang ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 
115b4('bum): lam gi rnam pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yo ngas su zin par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol du
115b5('bum): phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par 'a gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' skyon myed par chung gi bar nye du ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de
115b6('bum): ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang brtson 'grus
115b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon/ 
115b8('bum): myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba / 
116a1('bum): ka ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang phyi stong pa nyid dang bral
116a2('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang stong pa
116a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang chen po stong pa nyid gi bar du ci nas dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myeng pa
116a4('bum): chung gi bar du ci nas kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub seMs
116a5('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyi/ de dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems da pa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
116a6('bum): nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skye na myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed
116a7('bum): par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub
116a8('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur
116b1('bum): byang du mos pa'i spyod bye nga chu gi sa kya chu chu kyin pa zhi tshul bar gyi gyur te lta ston / 
116b2('bum): de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang dngos po myed pa
116b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chad gi bar du ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci
116b4('bum): nas kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byings
116b5('bum): chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du ci nas kyang yang dag par spong bra bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang dbang po lnga la bral bar myi 'gyur ba / 
116b6('bum): ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du dbang / po lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sem/ shes dpa'i skyon myed par chud gi bar du stobs lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur
116b7('bum): ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang byang chub gi yan lag bdun dang bral bar myi 'gyur/ ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud gi bar
116b8('bum): ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar
116b9('bum): ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang bsam rten bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang tshad myong ba bzhi dang bras
117a1('bum): myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpani
117a2('bum): skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pacu
117a3('bum): dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang rnam par ba rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de lta su
117a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang mngon pa/ der shes pa lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang ngachub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang bang / 
117a5('bum): 'dzin rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to// byang chub sem sa dpa'i skyon myed par chu go bar du ci nas kyang gzugs kyi/ sgo rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stan to// byang chub
117a6('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par rlung gi bar du ci nas kyang myi 'jigs pa
117a7('bum): bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chung gi bar du ci nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon skye
117a8('bum): par rlung gi bar dri ci nas kyang snying rje chen po dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par rlung gi bar du ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang bral bar myi 'gyur
117b1('bum): de ltar ston to// de las bdud gi las rnams kyang ston te/ des bdud gi las de dag thos nas 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel ba myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdud gi las de dag la ngo bo nyid myed do// 
117b2('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par rlung gi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsi ba de dag gis kyang byang chub
117b3('bum): sems dpa'i rigs yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur
117b4('bum): phyogs dang / rje phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang ga gi phyon/ nyes 'tshams dang / shar rje'i phyogs 'tshams dang / Ad+ha/ gi phyogs 'tshams dang / nu'i byeng gi phyogs 'arnams
117b5('bum): rig dang seng gi phyog so re re 'jig rted gi khams tshad med pa dgon bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa grangs myed pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 
117b6('bum): chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa'i tshul tshang bar gyur pa/ tshig gi lam nyams pa mi mnga' ba/ khur bor ba grong gi tsher ma rab tu bsal ba/ srid pa kun du sbyor ba/ yong su zad pa yang nga/ 
117b7('bum): ma kyi la zhun pa ma yoms sa rgyam bcom ldan das canams ga dge dun da gi sa m-i mang tshus na sa rgya ma
118a1('bum): 'am bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum 'am/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan nam 'phrul dga' 'am
118a2('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/ tshangs ris sam/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor ram/ tshangs chen nam/ snang ba 'am/ chung snang ngam/ tshad myed snang ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba 'am dge ba 'am chung dge
118a3('bum): 'am/ tshad myed dge ba 'am dge rgyas sam/ che ba 'am chung che 'am tshad med che ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba 'am/ mi che ba 'am/ myi gdung ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba 'am/ 'og min gi lha rnam
118a4('bum): sam/ sus kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskye ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu btul nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/ mchog phul
118a5('bum): gtso bo gya nom pa/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar bya sa te/ rjes su yi rang bar byas nas kyang sems can thams
118a6('bum): cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
118a7('bum): ces smras so// gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos gi nga
118a8('bum): 'dun rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la sems shing bsams nas/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/ mchog phul/ gtso bo gya nom pa/ bla na myed pa gong na myed pa mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam
118b1('bum): dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci
118b2('bum): log du mi 'gyur ba yin/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gis smras pa/ byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
118b3('bum): dang bcas pa de dag la sems kyang / de la sangs rgyas su 'du shes par myi 'gyur/ nyan thos su 'du shes par myi 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par myi 'gyur zhing / sems gang gis yongs su bsngo// 
118b4('bum): ba'i sems la yang sems gi 'du shes su myi 'gyur na/ de ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po la 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do// 
118b5('bum): seMs phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do// lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur bamyed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag
118b6('bum): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems shing mtshan mar 'dzin la/ mtshan mar bzung nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
118b7('bum): 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
118b8('bum): nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems pa'i sems de dag la yang dag par sems shing 'di ltar zad pa la zad ces bya bar shes la gang zad pa des yongasu bsngo bar myi nus/ sems ga
119a1('bum): gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yin la gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes/ gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba de log pa ma yin no// de ltar byang chub
119a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
