119a3('bum): rnams gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / de dag du so so'i skye bo mang pos
119a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed bskyed pa dang / chos bstan pa ji snyed cig thos pa dang / de dag du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
119a5('bum): gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang / rgya/ la rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/ bram ze'i rigs rje/ zhing mtho ba rnams sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnas
119a6('bum): sam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams sam/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams sam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams sam/ dga' ldan gi lha rnams sam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams sam/ gzhan
119a7('bum): 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams sam/ tshangs ris gi lha rnams sam/ tshangs lce nya phan gi lha rnams sam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams sam/ tshangs chen gi lha rnams sam/ snang ba'i lha
119a8('bum): rnams sam// chung snang gi lha rnams sam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams sam/ dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung dge'i lha rnams sam/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnam/ 
119b1('bum): sam/ dge rgyas gi lha rnams sam/ che ba'i lnga rnams sam/ chung che'i lha rnams sam/ tshad med che ba'i lnga rnams sam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams sam/ myi che ba'i lha rnams sam/ myi gdung ba'i lha/ 
119b2('bum): rnams sam ga bshin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams sam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ 'og min gi lha rnams sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos ji snyed thos te bla na myed
119b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab mchog/ phul gtso bo ngam pa gya nam pan bla na med pa / 
119b4('bum): na myed pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje sa su yi rang nas/ de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo zhing / gal te 'di ltar chos 'di dag
119b5('bum): thams cad ni zad do/ 'gags so myed do// rnam par gyur to tu gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang rang bzhin gis/ stong pa'o// zhes gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag
119b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// gal te 'di ltar chos gi yongs su bsngo bar myi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes
119b7('bum): bar shes la gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsdus pa yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin/ 
119b8('bum): pa la spyod pa dang / bsam rtan gi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyo
120a1('bum): pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub/ 
120a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par chags pa myed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang chags pa myed do// byang chub de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gang la chags par
120a3('bum): 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
120a4('bum): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba'i phung po dang / kharnams dang skye mched rnams kyi dben par shes te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pas dben par shes/ bsam rten gi pha rold tu phyin/ 
120a5('bum): pas dben par shes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pas dpe na par shes/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pas dben par shes tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pas dben par shes/ sbyin pa'i/ 
120a6('bum): pha rold tu phyin pas dben par shes/ nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ chen po/ 
120a7('bum): stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa spro// 
120a8('bum): pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gis dben par shes
120b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gis dben par shes/ dran pa nye bar
120b2('bum): bzhag pa rnams gis dben par shes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams gis dben par shes/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ dbang po rnams gis dben par shes/ stobs rnams kyis dben par
120b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis dben par shes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas dben par shes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ bsam rten rnams kyis dben par shes/ tshang byed
120b4('bum): pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju rtag pa rnams pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ rnam par thar pa ba rgyang gis dben par shes/ mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par
120b5('bum): 'jug pa chus dben par shes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/ dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas dben par shes/ mdo/ na par shes pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
120b6('bum): gis dben par shes/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben par shes/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dben par shes/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben par shes/ byams
120b7('bum): pa chen po dben par shes/ snying rje chen po dben par shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad gis dben par shes na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon
120b8('bum): par 'du bya ba de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par
121a1('bum): 'du bya ba de rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyis dben par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// dge ba'in
121a2('bum): ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub gi sems ga ngo bo nyid gis dben no// yongasu bsngo ba ni yongasu
121a3('bum): bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bas
121a4('bum): gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha
121a5('bum): rolang tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol/ da tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid// gis dben no// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du
121a6('bum): phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid/ 
121a7('bum): kyis dben no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid
121a8('bum): gos dben no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha'
121b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid gi nga tho nying gis dben na/ thog sa dang ba sa myed pa stong pa nyid ni thogs dang pa ma skyed pa stong pa nyid ging pa nyid gis dbe na/ dor ba byed pa stong pa 'i ni nga pa myed pa snang pa nyid gangan nyid gis
121b2('bum): dben no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid
121b3('bum): stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// dngos po stong pa nyid ni dngos po stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ 
121b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi ngo ngo bo nyid gis dben no// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa
121b5('bum): bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no/ rdzu/ 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams gi ngo bo
121b6('bum): nyid gis dben no// dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// stobs rnams ni stobs rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis dben ni/ byang chub gi yan lag rnams ni byang chub gi yan lag rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis
121b7('bum): dben no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// bas
121b8('bum): gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyi ba nyid gis dben na/ chad myed pa rnams ni tshangad myed pa rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis dben na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs byed pa ma rnam sa pa ba
122a1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam par tha rad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i do
122a2('bum): bo nyid gis dben no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// mngon par shes
122a3('bum): papa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis dben no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams gis dben no// gzungs gi sgo rnams ni gzungs gi sgo rnams gis dben no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i staH/ 
122a4('bum): bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gi ngo bo nyid gis dbu dan no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi nas so yang dag par
122a5('bum): rig pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'ingo bo nyid gis dben no// sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres pa rnam sa ni sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid gis dben no// 
122a6('bum): zhes bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
122a7('bum): phyin pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu bsngo// 
122a8('bum): na/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta
122a9('bum): byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
122b1('bum): bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba 'di yang yong su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang de dang tshul mthun te/ de'i ngo bo nyid myed do zhes gal te de ltar shes na bla na med pa yang dag
122b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su bsngos na 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log du myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log du mi 'gyur ro// gal te byang
122b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan pa'i tshul gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na/ bla na myed pa yang
122b4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa ma yin no// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no zhes gal te de lta
122b5('bum): sems na yang mtshan mar byed pa yin gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su ba sngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar na de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur// 
122b6('bum): sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log du 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par du
122b7('bum): bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag yongasu shes pa myed cing / mtshan mar myi byed na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
122b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log du myi 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log du myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log du myi 'gyur ro// byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dang
123a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mtshan mar myi byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin/ rab 'byor gis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
123a2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa de dag la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o// 
123a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// byams pas smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ 
123a4('bum): myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang myed de myi dmyigs so// zhes bya ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang myed de myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang / gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag pa
123a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag myed de myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smos par myi 'gyur/ ma snyam na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
123a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha mad tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su brtog par bya ste/ bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gagos par gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/ mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang gas
123a7('bum): par gyur/ sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'gags par 'gyur/ bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing / rna
123a8('bum): sa na gshegs pa grasas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas rnams kyis ni rna sa dam dum gis yang su badz+ra pa 'i rjes su dgyes pas/ mau pa dus chu sa mngo du na
123b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog ste/ dmyigs pa ni de'i dmyigs pa chen por 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
123b2('bum): chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas myi dmyigs shing mtshan ma myed par bya ste/ yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni
123b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gis yongs su bsngo ba don che bar ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug can zug rngu can te/ 'di ltar dper na kha zas gsod pa kha do// 
123b4('bum): phun sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang dug dang dres par gyur na/ kha dog dang dri dang / ro yid du 'ong ba yang yin ming gi/ 'on kyang dug can du zad na/ de la skyes bu byis pa'i dang
123b5('bum): tshul can shes rab 'chal pa'i nga tshul can ni bza' bar sems te/ des zos na'ang kha dog dang dri dang ro zhim par tshor mo gi/ sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gi rnam par smin por 'gyur ro// de bzhin
123b6('bum): du yid la log par rig pa dang / log par shes pa dang / log par bslabs pa la don ma rtogs shing 'di skad du ston/ tshur rigs gi bu khyod gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
123b7('bum): 'das rnams gzugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings/ 
123b8('bum): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du
124a1('bum): mdzad pa dang mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang // 
124a2('bum): mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur
124a3('bum): ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du
124a4('bum): phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad pa ra gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad de dge
124a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mdo na par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam rten bzhi bsgoms te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig/ 
124a6('bum): mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa nga
124a7('bum): mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i ste/ la bsgoms te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / 
124a8('bum): mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bsgoms te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par

125b1('bum): pa dang yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su sman par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims gi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gi phung po dang / shes rab gi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung go

125b8('bum): chos bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin/ par 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge/

128a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sangs rgyas gi ye shes bla na myed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi ngang tshul gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa de thogasasu chud do//

128b1('bum): bar bya ste/ de ltar yongasu bsngos na de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smras pa dang / chos bzhin du smra bar 'gyur// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

128b3('bum): spyod ba'i tshe// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di ltar yongasu bsngo bar bya ste/ 'di ltar gzugs 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khong su ma yin te/ grang khong su ma yin

129b2('bum): ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// ro 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongasasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ 
129b3('bum): ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma/ 
129b4('bum): yin ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// chos 'a dong pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs mye da pa'i khams kyi khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin
129b5('bum): pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba/ 'ang ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang nga / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi kho
129b6('bum): su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'angam yin da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin nog/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / 
129b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i/ 
129b8('bum): khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang mi yin no// 
130a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin ma 'ongs pa
130a2('bum): yang ma yin da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa 'ang ma yin no// gang khongasu chud pa ma gyi
130a3('bum): pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// yid gi rnam pa shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud

130a5('bum): gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams
130a6('bum): dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'i nga ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no/ 
130a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/

130b1('bum): 'ang ma yin ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// lus gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ ga
130b2('bum): khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// yid gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i

130b4('bum): pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yi dran pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin da ltar
130b5('bum): byung ba yang ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khong su chud pa ma yin te gang

135b1('bum): gang khongs su chung ba ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'angs yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa pazhi 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams na
135b2('bum): khongs su chung pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi
135b3('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// snying rje chen po 'dod pa'i khas
135b4('bum): gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das dpa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin
135b5('bum): sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de
135b6('bum): ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// de bzhin nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gi khongs su chung ba ma yin
135b7('bum): te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// ma nor pa de bzhin nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i
135b8('bum): khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang gzugs
136a1('bum): myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'angam yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// chos nyid 'dod pa'i khams
136a2('bum): dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin/ 
136a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin
136a4('bum): da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// chos gi gnas nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gri khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa
136a5('bum): ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar/ byung ba yang ma yin no// chos skyon myed pa nyid 'dod pa'i kham sa dang / gzugs gi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i khams
136a6('bum): gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs
136a7('bum): kyi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ bsam gis myi khya
136a8('bum): pa'i dbyings 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chung ba ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin / 
136b1('bum): ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// tshul khrims 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma dayin
136b2('bum): ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin/ 
136b3('bum): pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// shes rab 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ 
136b4('bum): gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'o// rdzanges pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// rnam par gro// la ba 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs
136b5('bum): myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs stesu chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// rnam grol ba'i ye shes
136b6('bum): mthong ba 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin dam 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin
136b7('bum): da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma
136b8('bum): yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// myi mnyam pa'i chos nyid 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs
137a1('bum): chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
137a2('bum): kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin// de ci'i
137a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni khongs su chud ba ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du yongs su bsdu ba yang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa
137a4('bum): 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de yang khongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma
137a5('bum): yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// gang yongs su bsngo ba de ya de khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin/ pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// 
137a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas
137a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin/ nyan thos de dag kyang khong
137a8('bum): su chud pa ma yin/ de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang khongasu chud pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang khongasu chud pa ma yin/ de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang khongasu chud pa ma yin te/ gang khongasu chud
137b1('bum): ba ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar gang gzug
137b2('bum): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'od ma yin// de ni mtshan pa'i/ 
137b3('bum): tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongasasu bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pa ste yongasu
137b4('bum): bsngo bar myi nus so// tshor ba gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzu dgas kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongasasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ 
137b5('bum): da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gis yong su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni
137b6('bum): dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa de ni dngos po myed pas yong su bsngo bar myi nus so// 'du shes gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzu gas gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongasu chud
137b7('bum): pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yong su bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na de la rang
137b8('bum): bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// 'du byed gang 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
138a1('bum): myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin no// de ni mtshan ma'i tshul las dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su/ 
138a2('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de la dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam par shes pa gang 'dod ci/ 
138a3('bum): khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam
138a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de nga ni dngos po med pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po med pas yongs
138a5('bum): bsngo bar myi nus so// myig gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gi khongs su chud/ pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin
138a6('bum): ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin med pa ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa
138a7('bum): ni dngos po myed pa ste yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rna ba gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'angs

138b5('bum): ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nu sa so// lus gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/

138b7('bum): bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// yid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin/

139b5('bum): myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhi na myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po mye/ byed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// myig gi rnam par she/

139b7('bum): lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongasasu bsngo bar myi nus
139b8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni
140a1('bum): mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongasasu
140a2('bum): bsngo bar myi nus so// sna'i rnam par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin da ltar byung ba 'angs
140a3('bum): yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs
140a4('bum): bsngo bar myi nus so// lce'i rnam par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang rkang gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs/ su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin//

140a7('bum): ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni/ 
140a8('bum): dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongasu bsngo bar myi nus so// yid gi rnam par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongasu chud pa ma yin pa dem
140b1('bum): ba'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin med pa den
140b2('bum): dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin
140b3('bum): pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin
140b4('bum): myed pa ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongasu chud
140b5('bum): pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin nam 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs/ pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin
140b6('bum): myed do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sna'i 'dus te re ga pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i
140b7('bum): khams gi khongasu chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la
140b8('bum): rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i
141a1('bum): khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ da ltar mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongasu bsngo bar mi nus
141a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi
141a3('bum): khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo/ 
141a4('bum): par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod
141a5('bum): pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan
141a6('bum): ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin myed pra de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs
141a7('bum): su bsngo bar myi nus so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma

141b2('bum): pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin

141b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzug sa kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud po ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin nad ltar/ 
141b7('bum): byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po

145b8('bum): mongs su bsdu bar gyi nus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs pa khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma chom po'angam / 
146a1('bum): da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin// de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ 
146a2('bum): dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// chen po stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa/ 
146a3('bum): 'a'angam yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'dra ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin med do// gang la rang bzhin

151b3('bum): yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed de
151b4('bum): gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzug/ 
151b5('bum): myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su ma chud pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yi nang / ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongasasu bsngo
151b6('bum): bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rang byang chub gang 'dod pa'i khams
151b7('bum): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyig
151b8('bum): pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so
152a1('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba
152a2('bum): 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed
152a3('bum): pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin ma 'ongs pa 'ang / 
152a4('bum): mi yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po
152a5('bum): myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar/ myi nus so// myi mnyam pa'i chos nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang // gzugs gi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su
152a6('bum): chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang
152a7('bum): bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myong ba ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa gleng 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
152a8('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su nud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ de ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yongasu bsngo bar gyi/ 
152b1('bum): de tso'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngas po myeng ba s+ho/ dngas pa myed pa na dngas paskyed pas yongs su bsngo bar myo nus son sa de ltar gas na/ byang nub sems dpa' sam
152b2('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba dug myed pa yin te/ bdud rtsi'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum mtshan ma'i tshul las dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dge pa'i
152b3('bum): de dag yongs su bsngo na/ de ni ldog par yongs su bsngo ba yin gi/ yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin no// log pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gis bsngags pa ma yin te/ gang
152b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gis myi bsngags pa'i yodas su bsngos pa des ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
152b5('bum): su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod/ sa su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol
152b6('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur
152b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur
152b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// zag ma dang pa ma myongan sto
153a1('bum): gapa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
153a2('bum): myi 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyuraro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
153a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su
153a4('bum): rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzog sa par myi 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan
153a5('bum): lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i la/ ma yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 'pha/ gas pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur/ bsam rten
153a6('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par thard pa rnams
153a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs/ 
153a8('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// mngon par zhes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153b1('bum): stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur
153b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi/ 
153b3('bum): 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyi/ 
153b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ra myi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 
153b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa sto/ 
153b6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs
153b7('bum): rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par
153b8('bum): myi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur/ 
154a1('bum): pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 
154a2('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs
154a3('bum): su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur
154a4('bum): ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i
154a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rku yong su rdzogs par myi
154a6('bum): 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs
154a7('bum): su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs gi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur
154a8('bum): ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba des na// 
154b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par myi 'gyur/ gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de ni bla na myed/ 
154b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154b3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba bya ste/ des
154b4('bum): yongs su bsngos na yong su bsngo ba'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thu gas su chud pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang chos nyid des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bya'o/ 
154b5('bum): zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshed nga ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor leg sa so legs so// rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sas
154b6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasasu bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam
154b7('bum): bar byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / gzhan ma/ 
154b8('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid gi tshul gis bstan pa ni/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di'i sems can de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las gi/ 
155a1('bum): kyi am thob par gyur / bsam nyan bzhi thob par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyam su par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na rab
155a2('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor debs
155a3('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i/ 
155a4('bum): yongasu bsngo ba de'i rab ces bya'o// gtso'o zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes ra bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// du mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
155a5('bum): yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di nis/ mas can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyurapa// 
155a6('bum): dgra bcom par gyur pa/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dgra bcom par gyur
155a7('bum): pa de dag thams cad la nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ rab 'byor
155a8('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 8
155b1('bum): 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed par yongs su bsngo bas/ yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar na rigs
155b2('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya
155b3('bum): gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
155b4('bum): mo la la zhig gis gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mdo bos rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du seMs/ 
155b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde/ bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
155b6('bum): 'byor de de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongasu bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de'i dge ba'i
155b7('bum): rtsa ba rnams la chags pa myed pa yongasu bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ 8/ 
155b8('bum): 'byor de gzhan yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de la shar phyogs/ 
156a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i re la yang gos dang / bas snyoms dang sam
156a2('bum): stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rje dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byang thams cad kyis bstan bkur byas
156a3('bum): ba dang / phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms
156a4('bum): dang / mel stan dang / nang gi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gro byas/ bkure sti byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams
156a5('bum): cad gis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed/ cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
156a6('bum): dpa' chen pos re re la la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / ma la stan dang / nang gi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gaga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas phu dud du
156a7('bum): byas mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad gis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gre bya sems can ji snyed cig yod po de dag thams
156a8('bum): cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gro byas/ bkur sti byas
156a9('bum): phu dung du byes/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yong po den
156b1('bum): thathams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng du rim 'gror byas/ bkur sti byas bu drung dud+ha/ 
156b2('bum): mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad gis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang
156b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nang gi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du
156b4('bum): byas mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ge'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thos
156b5('bum): cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la ya/ nga gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ram gror
156b6('bum): byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed
156b7('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal ston dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsa dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gro byas
156b8('bum): bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thos
157a1('bum): gcad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po skal ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ 
157a2('bum): bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad gis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de ngag
157a3('bum): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nang gi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gro byas bkur sti byas
157a4('bum): phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa
157a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom lnga na 'das tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de ni dpe' bgyi bar yang
157a6('bum): dka'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni/ 'jig rten gi khams ga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
157a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so leg so// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongasu bsngo bas/ bla na med pa yang dag
157a8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o phul n+d+he
157b1('bum): bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma nges brgya 'chir yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang
157b2('bum): nye bar mya 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ bye ba khrag
157b3('bum): khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang rgyur yang nye bar myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo gang dge ba bcu'i las gi lam dang ldan
157b4('bum): gyur pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzug sa myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can no// de ltar sems
157b5('bum): can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / sems can tham sa cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cadaphyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad dgra bcom par
157b6('bum): gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu gyu ra pa de dag la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang mal stan dang / nang gi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed pa'i/ 
157b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de dag kyang dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can no// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris gi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te thal mo sbyar nas/ dga' bo'i yid gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsham
157b8('bum): te 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma'i ma
158a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / bgying ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myed par 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par myi 'gyur
158a2('bum): ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bsngo ba shin du che'o// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum ga rigs kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyis
158a3('bum): tog dang lha rdzas gi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas gi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas gi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas gi gdugs dang / lha rdzas gi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas
158a4('bum): kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas gi spos dang / lha rdzas gi byug pa dang / lha rdzas gi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi
158a5('bum): na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rtor to// ra/ ba tu gtor to/ mngon par rtor to// 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ ba
158a6('bum): ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tha bas mkhas pas dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gis dge ba'i rtsa
158a7('bum): ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yong su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

159b6('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ji nas kyang gnyis
159b7('bum): 'gyur ba'i tshul dang / gnyis ma lags par myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba shin tu che'o// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba khrag ldan
159b8('bum): brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
160a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gis man/ 
160a2('bum): pa ngo mtshar tsha'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do// de nas kun snang dang ba'i lci bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang napa de lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'am/ 
160a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma bangs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa dmyigs/ 
160a4('bum): pu'i spyod pa can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi zil gis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'i/ zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do// de nas dag rgyas gi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de lhags/

160a6('bum): yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan dmyigs pa'i spyod pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangasu brjod do// 
160a7('bum): de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
160a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa dmyigs pa spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zig
160b1('bum): kyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do// de nas gnas rtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi
160b2('bum): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas
160b3('bum): pa dang mi ldan pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha rnams dang myi
160b4('bum): ldan pa dmyigs pa la spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gi sa mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o// zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris gi lha NA/ 
160b5('bum): dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 
160b6('bum): kun snang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas rtsang ma'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams gi sems ca
160b7('bum): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag
160b8('bum): thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin
161a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bas su rtan gi pha rol du phyin pa 'am shes rab kyi pha rol du na
161a2('bum): pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am te tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am brtson 'grus sam/ bsam rten nam shes rab bam/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'o/ ting nge 'dzin gi phung po 'am/ shes rab kyi phung po 'am rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/ 
161a3('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rje su yi rang ba byas la/ de ltar rje su yi rang nas kyang dmyigs pa'i tshal gis bla na
161a4('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ des 'das pa dang ma byon
161a5('bum): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am tshul khrims kyi
161a6('bum): phu rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am kra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam phyi stong pa nyid da / 
161a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma/ 
161a8('bum): mying pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngon
161b1('bum): stong pa nyid myan/ dngos pa skyed pa'i ngab nyid stong pa nyid ngam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul ginang pa rnams sas/ dbang po rnams sam stobs rnams sam byang chub kyi
161b2('bum): yon las rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam tan rnams sam// tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams samangs/ 
161b3('bum): bar thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ 
161b4('bum): gzungs gi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'am/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyun tu
161b5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyi ra myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chu/ ba bam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
161b6('bum): dam/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas gi chos tshad myed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags pa myed pa'i tshul dang byed pa myed pa'i
161b7('bum): tshul gyis rje su yi rang ba'i bar gis rje su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i rtsa bo dang dam pa dang / mchog dang phul dang / gya nom pa dang bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang
161b8('bum): nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags pa myed pa'i tshul dang / byed pa myed pa'i tshul gis rje su yi ring ba'i rab kyis/ 
162a1('bum): rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang mchog dang / phul dang gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang rje su yin
162a2('bum): nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags pa myed pa'i tshul dang / byed pa myed pa'i tshul gis bla na myed pa yang dag par
162a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma 'i
162a4('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba
162a5('bum): dpe' dang rgyur yang myi bzod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' me na po dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul gis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rje te mchog ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o/ 
162a6('bum): phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya'o// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das
162a7('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste rje su yi rang ba'i rang
162a8('bum): kyis rje su yi rang ba dang / rje su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang mchog dang / phul dang gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi rang bar byed do zhes
162b1('bum): stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gis na rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ ci tsam gis na rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang mchog dang / phul dang gya nom pa dang bla na ma mchis pa dang gong nam
162b2('bum): mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / 
162b3('bum): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi/ 
162b4('bum): len myi rtong ba dang / myi rlom myi 'dzum zhing dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin la 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba myed/ 'gag pa 'ang myed/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang myed/ 
162b5('bum): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'ang myed/ chos de dag la 'grib par 'gyur/ ra ba 'ang myed de/ 'phel ba 'ang myed 'ong ba myed/ 'gro ba 'ang / myed/ phung por 'gyur ba 'ang med do// zhes rna grangs de lta bus 'dra/ 
162b6('bum): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor po de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid ji ltar
162b7('bum): de ltar bdag gis rje su yi rang bar bya'o// rjes su yi rang nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing da ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po'i rjes su
162b8('bum): yi rang ba de ni dam par 'gyur te/ rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni gtso bo dang / dam pa dang mchog dang phul dang / gya nom pa dang bla na myed pa dang / gong na med pa dang mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// 
163a1('bum): bye ba brgya stong gachi dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha yang nye bar myi 'gro ste/ rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// mchog ces
163a2('bum): phulA zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gang na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya'o// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
163a3('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'das pa dang / ma byon dang / da ltar byung ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gisas
163a4('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gi sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod/ pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam rten
163a5('bum): gi pha rol de tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ji snyed pa dang / gzham
163a6('bum): yang sangs rgyas gi chos tshad med pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rje su yi rang bar bya'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs/ rnam pa
