206b1('bum): bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
206b2('bum): kyis tshor ba che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// sa'i khams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// chu'i khams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// me'i khams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rlung gi khas
206b3('bum): che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do/ nam mkha'i khams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams che bar myi bgyid do// chung bar myi bgyid do// ma rig pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// 'du
206b4('bum): byed che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// mying dang gzugs che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// skye mched drug che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// 
206b5('bum): reg pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do/ te tshor ba che bar myi bgyi/ nga chung bar myi bgyid do// sred pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// le nad pa che bar myi bgyid da chung bar myi bgyid do// 
206b6('bum): srid pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid // skye ba che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rga shi che bar myi bgyid nga chung bar myi bgyid ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid ngo // 
206b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar bgyid do// bsam
206b8('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// nang stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// phyi stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid
207a1('bum): chung bar myi bgyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// chen po stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// don dam/ 
207a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do 'dus byas stong pa nyid che bar myi dgyid chung bar myi bgying ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid
207a3('bum): chung bar myi bgyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid che bar 'ami bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// chos thams
207a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rang gi mtsha/ na nyid stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// myi dmyigs/ pa stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// dngos po med pa s+ho// 
207a5('bum): pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// dran pa nye bar
207a6('bum): gzhag pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// yang dag par spong ba rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// dbang po rnams che bar myi bgyid
207a7('bum): chung bar rtsa myi bgyid do// stobs rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// 
207a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// bsam gtan rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// tshad med pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// gzugs med med pa'i snyoms par
207b1('bum): 'jug pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rnam par thard pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa par 'jug pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rnam par tha ra gi/ 
207b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang smon pa med pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// mngon par shes pa rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// gzungs kyi
207b3('bum): sgo rnams che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams che bar myi
207b4('bum): bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// snying rje che po che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar myi bgyid chung nga bar myi bgyid do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar myi bgyid chung bar
207b5('bum): myi bgyid do/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid che bar myi bgyid/ chung bar myi bgyid do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos
207b6('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// dgra bcom pa nyid che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rang byang chub che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid che bar myi bgyid
207b7('bum): chung bar myi bgyid do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid ngo // gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni gzugs 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid / 
207b8('bum): che ba 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// 'du shes 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// 'du byed 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid ngo // myig 'du
208a1('bum): par myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// rna ba 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// sna 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// lce 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// lus 'du bar myi bgyid yangs/ 
208a2('bum): par myi byed do// yid 'dra bar myi bgyid sbyangs par myi bgyid do// gzugs 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// sna 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// dri 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid ngo // ro 'dra bar myi dbyin
208a3('bum): yangs par myi byed do// reg 'du bar myi 'gyur yangs par myi byed do// chos 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// myig gi rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi
208a4('bum): ma byed yangs par myi byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dra bar myi bgyi du yangs par myi bgyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi
208a5('bum): bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'du bar/ myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'du/ bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
208a6('bum): ra myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// lus kyi 'dus te b.reg pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs
208a7('bum): par myi bgyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkyend kyis tshar ba 'dra bar mya brgyad yangs par mya bgyid / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
208a8('bum): tshor ba 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// 
208b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// lus kyis 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'du bar myi bgyid/ yangs par myi bgyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba

208b7('bum): myi bgyid do/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du tu phyind pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'du bar myi bgyid/ yangs par myi bgyid do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'du
208b8('bum): bar myi bgyid do yangs par mi bgyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// shes rab
209a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'dra bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// nang stong pa nyid 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// phyi stong pa nyid 'du bar myi bgyid yangs par myi bgyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'du bar myi

212a6('bum): snying rje chen po tshad ma mchis par myi bgyid tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad mchis par mi bgyid chad ma mchis
212a7('bum): par mi bgyid do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu tshad med ma mchis par myi bgyid tshad ma mchis par myi bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chang

212b1('bum): ba shes pa nyid tshad mchis par mi bgyid tshad ma mchis par myi bgyid// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshad mchis par mi bgyid tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid do// gzhan yang shes rab
212b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs rgya chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyidado/ tshor ba rgya chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do// 'du shes rgya chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do// 'du byed rgya chen por mi
212b3('bum): bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do/ rnam par shes pa rgya chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// myig rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// rna ba rgya chen por myi bgyid chung ngur myi bgyid do// sna rgya
212b4('bum): chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// lce rgya chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do// lus rgya tshon por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// yid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur
212b5('bum): mi bgyid do// gzugs rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// sgra chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// dri rgya chen po mi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// ro rgya chen por mi
212b6('bum): bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// reg rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// chos rgya chen por mye gyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// myig gyi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi dgyid rgya chung ngur mi gyid
212b7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid
212b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngu
213a1('bum): myi bgyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che bar myi bgying rgya chung bar myi bgyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chu
213a2('bum): ngur myi bgyid ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por mi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por
213a3('bum): skye bgyid rgya rlung ngur myi bgyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por mi bgyid/ sna rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa lus byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur mi bgyid/ 
213a4('bum): mo'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung / dngur myi bgyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya/ chen por myi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur myi bgyid de/ yid kyi 'dus
213a5('bum): tereg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por myi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur myi ngargya do// sa'i khams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// chu'i khams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 
213a6('bum): me'i khams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// rlung gi khams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// nam mkha'i khams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya
213a7('bum): chen por myi bgyid chung ngur myi bgyid de/ ma rig pa rgya chun por bgying rgya chung bgyid do// 'du byed rgya chen por myi bgyid rgyu chung ngur myi bgyid do/ rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 
213a8('bum): mying dang gzugs rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// skye mched drug rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// reg rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid // tshor ba rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngu
213b1('bum): myi bgyid do// sred pa rgya chen por myi dgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// len pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur gyi bgyid ngo // sprid pa rgya chen por myi dbying du chung ngur myi dbying ngo // skye ba rgya chen por myi dbying du rlung dur byi/ 
213b2('bum): bgyid do/ rga shi rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 
213b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen por myi bgyi rgya chung ngur
213b4('bum): myi bgyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// nang stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyi bgyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur
213b5('bum): myi bgyid do phyi nang stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 
213b6('bum): don dam stong pa nyid rgya chu bor myi bgying rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya che bar myi bgying rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi dpyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// mtha' yas
213b7('bum): 'das pa spong ba nyid rgyu che bar myi byed rgya chung ngur myi bgyi dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur gyi bgyid do// dor ba med pastong pa nyid rgya che bar myi bgyid d+ha rlung ngur myi bgyid do// rang bzhim
213b8('bum): stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// chos thams cad stong ba nyid rgya chen por myi bgying rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// rang byi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid rgya chen chen por myi dbyid do rgya chung ngur myi 'bying do// 
214a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid dong/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do/ 
214a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// yang dag par spong ba rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do/ 
214a3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// dbang po rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// stobs rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid cha rgya chung bur myi bgyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rgya chen
214a4('bum): por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do rgya bsam gtan rnams rgya chen por myi
214a5('bum): bgying rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// tshad myed pa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// rnam par tharapa
214a6('bum): brgyad rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med
214a7('bum): ba rgya che bar myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// mngon par shes pa rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams rgya che bar myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya
214a8('bum): chung ngur myi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rgya che bar myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rgya chen por myi bgyid
214b1('bum): byams pa chen por myi gyid/ rgyu chung ngur myi bgyid de
214b2('bum): rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// snying rje chen po rgya chen por myi bgyid do// rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rgya chen por myi bgyid chung ngur myi bgyid do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya
214b3('bum): chung ngur myi bgyid do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// dgra bcom pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid do rgya chung ngur myi
214b4('bum): bgyid de/ rang byang chub rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung ngur myi bgyid do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rgya chen por myi bgyid rgya chung
214b5('bum): ngur myi bgyid do// gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni gzugs mthu dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' dang ma mchis par myi bgyid do// tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// 
214b6('bum): 'du shes mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// 'du byed mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis
214b7('bum): par myi bgyid do// myig mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mtshachis par myi bgyid do// rna ba mthu dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// sna mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// 
214b8('bum): mthul dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid ngo // lus mthub dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid ngo // ying mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// gzugs mthu' dang / 
214b9('bum): ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// sgra mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' mchis par myi bgyid do// dri mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// ro mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma/ 
215a1('bum): mchis par myi bgyid do// reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// chos mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu ma mchis par myi bgyid do// myig gi rnam par shes pa mthu'i ma/ 
215a2('bum): dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchi
215a3('bum): par myi bgyid do/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// yid kyi rnam par
215a4('bum): shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid dro / myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthul ma mchis par myi bgyi ngo mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// 
215a5('bum): rna'i 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis pa/ myi bgyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
215a6('bum): mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par
215a7('bum): myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bra mthun
215a8('bum): dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe ba mthu' dang ldan par bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthul
215b1('bum): dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu'am mchis par myi bgyid dong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba 'i tshor
215b2('bum): ba mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// sa'i khams dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// chu'i khams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par mi bgyid
215b3('bum): me'i khams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid nga ngo/ rlung gyi khams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// nam mkha'i khams mthu' dang ldan par
215b4('bum): myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khas mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// ma rig pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis pa
215b5('bum): myi bgyid do/ 'du byed mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// mying dang gzugs mthu' dang ldan par myi
215b6('bum): bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// skye mched drug mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// tshor ba mthu' dang ldan
215b7('bum): par myi bgyid mthu' dang ma mchis par myi bgyid do// sred pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid do// mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// len pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// srid pa mthu'
215b8('bum): dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// skye ba mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rga shi mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid nga mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
216a1('bum): phyi nad pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang mthul dang ldan par/ 
216a2('bum): myi bgyid mthu'am mchis par myi bgyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mchis par myi bgyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyi
216a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// nang stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do/ phyi stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid
216a4('bum): mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// chen/ 
216a5('bum): bzong rdzo gyu dang ldan par myi bamyong mthu ma mchis pa zhi kyi/ don ma paskyongs nyid thun dang ldan par 'i dbying mthu gyi bgyid de/ 'dus byas stong ba nyid mthu dang 'an par
216a6('bum): mthu' deng mi mi chis par myi bgyid // 'dus ma byas stong bgying mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu'am mchis par myi byed do// mtha' pas 'angs pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu'am mchis par myi dbyir/ 
216a7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthu' dang
216a8('bum): ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid ma mthu' ma mchis par mying bgyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid do mthu' ma mchis
216b1('bum): par myi bgyid do gar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mthachis par myi bgyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// ngo bo nyid
216b2('bum): stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthu'
216b3('bum): dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// yang dag par spong ba rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid ngo mthu' ma
216b4('bum): mchis par myi bgyid do// dbang po rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// stobs rnams mthu' dang ldan par ra myi bgyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthu' dang ldan par mi
216b5('bum): bgyid mthu' dang ma mchis par myi bgyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par/ myi bgyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par
216b6('bum): myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// bsam gtan rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' dang ma mchis par myi bgyid do// tshad myed pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis pam myi bgyid do// 
216b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rnam par tharang pa'i ska sang ba te brgyad mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' mchis par myi bgyid ngo // mthar kyis
216b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma michis par gyi bgying ngo // rnam par tharang pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa skyeng pa dang smon pa byed pa mthu' dang ldan par gyi bgyid mthu'ab mchis par gyi
217a1('bum): bgyid do// mngon par shes pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid ngo do// gzungs kyi
217a2('bum): sgo rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi mthu' dang ldan par/ 
217a3('bum): myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// snying rje chen po mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// 
217a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco ba rgyad mthu dang sman pa kyi bgying mthu ma mchis par myi bgyid do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthu' dang snyan par myi bgying mthu'am mchis par gyi 'byibyung ngo // 
217a5('bum): land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'dren du mthu' dang ldan par myi bgyid mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do
217a6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mthu dang ldan par myi bgying mthu' dang ma mchis par myi bgyid // rang byang chub mthun dang san par myi bgyid mthu'am myi bgying ngo // lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi 'ab+h+ring
217a7('bum): mthu' ma mchis par myi bgyid do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams mthu dang ldan par myi dbyid mthu ma mchis par myi bgying ngo // bcom ldan 'das grangs des na 'di 'i / shes rab
217a8('bum): royong tu byind pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pa ros tu phyin par// bcom ldan 'das gas te gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas
217b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten du// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtend/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtend/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la brtend/ rdul khrims kyi 'a rol
217b2('bum): phyibyind la brtend/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la brten nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs che bar myi bgyi chung bar myi bgyid ngo // tshor ba che bar myi bgying chung bar myi bgyid do// 'du shes che bar
217b3('bum): kyi byed chung bar myi byed do// 'du byed che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// rnam par shes pa che bar myi bgyid rlung bar myi bgyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig che bar mi bgyid chung bar myi bgyi / 
217b4('bum): rnab che bar myi dbyed chung bar myi byed do// sna che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// lce che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// lus che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed de/ ying che bar myi byed chung bar myi bye
217b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ gzugs che bar myi byed chung bar myi bgyid do// sna che bar myi byed chung bar myed do// dri bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// ro che bar myi byang chung bar myi byed do// 
217b6('bum): reg che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// chos che bar mi byed chung bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtse
217b7('bum): bAr myi byed chung bar myi byed de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi rnyed do// sus rnam par shes pa che bar myi byeng nub par myi byed do/ 
217b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa che bar myi byad chung bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa che bar myi byeng chung bar myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi byed/ 
218a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa che bar myi byed chub
218a2('bum): bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe ba che bar myi bgyid chung bar myi bgyid do// sna'i 'dus
218a3('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba che bar myi byed chung bar myi bgyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// 
218a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba che bar myi byed chung bar myi byedado/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sa'i khams che bar myi byed chung bar/ myi byed do// chu'i khams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// me'i
218a5('bum): khams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rlung gi khams che bar myi byed/ chung bar myi byed do// nam mkha'i khams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams che bar myi byed chung bar myi bye'o// 
218a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ ma rig pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// 'du byed che bar myi byed chub par myi byed do// rnam par shes pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// mying dang gzugs che bar bar myi byed chung
218a7('bum): par myi byed do// skye mched drug che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// reg pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// tshor ba che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// sring pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// len pa che bar myi byed chung
218a8('bum): bar myi byed do/ srid pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// skye brtse bar myi byed chung por myi byed do// rga shi che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa che bar myi byed
218b1('bum): chung bar myi byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar myi byed chung bar myid byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi bye/ 
218b2('bum): dobasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myed byed do// phyi stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// phyi
218b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// chen po stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid che bar myi byeng chung bar myi byed do/ 
218b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid che bar myi byeng chung bar myi byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// mtha' lus di 'das bstod pa nyid che bar myi steng rung bar myi byeng ngo // thog ma dang / 
218b5('bum): rdza mid bzung ba nyid me bar myi byeng dring bar gyi bye / ra da ba stong pa nyid che bar gyi drung par gyi byung / na da cher gyi byed chung ba myi da/ na thams cad
218b6('bum): gyi da da do// ky-i hU~MSh+Ti byu kyi pa da/ 
218b7('bum): deb nyid stong pa nyid che par sti byeng rlung ngur myi byed do// dngos po med pa'i da bo nyid stong pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// shes rab tu ba mang du byin ni/ dranu ba nye ba gzhag pa rnams che bar myi byed
218b8('bum): chung bar gyi byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams che bar gyi byeng chung bar myi byed // rdzu 'drul gyi nang pa rnams chog kyi byeng chung bar myi byeng ngo // dbang po rnams che bar gyi byang chung bar gyi byed ngo comam
219a1('bum): che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi
219a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// bsam gtan rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// tshad med pa rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// gzugs/ 
219a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam par thard pa brgyad che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
219a4('bum): pa dgu che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa che bar myi bye chung bar myi byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mngon par shes rab rnams che ba
219a5('bum): myi byed chung bar myi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams che bar myi byed chung / bar myi byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams che bar myi byed chung bar/ myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ de bzhin gshes
219a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// snying rje chen po
219a7('bum): che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// lan cig
219a8('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// rang byang chub che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// 
219b1('bum): lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams che bar myi byed chung bar myi byed do// zhes bgyi ba'i bar du 'du shes su gyur pa dang / 
219b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po la brtend/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtend/ brtson 'grus
219b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brten da/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la brtend/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtend/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la la brten de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa ni
219b4('bum): gzugs 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// tshor ba 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// 'du shes 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// 'du byed 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rnam par shes pa

219b8('bum): byed do// chos 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa che bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// 
220a1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// yid kyi

220b8('bum): myi byed yangs par myi byed do// mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'du
221a1('bum): bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'du
221a2('bum): bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dra bar myi byed yangs pa

221a4('bum): spong ba rnams 'bru bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// dbang po rjes 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// stobs rnams 'dra bar myi

221a6('bum): byinang pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'acu byar myi byed sangs par myi byeng ngo // bsam grang na rnams 'dra bar myi byed sangs par gyi byed ngo// chang myong pa rnams 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed // gzugs
221a7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed // mthar kyis gnas pa'i chos
221a8('bum): par 'jug pa dgu 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mi// 
221b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dra bar myi byed do/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin
221b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// snying rje
221b3('bum): chen po 'du bar myi byed yangs papar myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'du bar myi bye dra yangs par myi byed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'du bar mi
221b4('bum): byed yangs par myi byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dra/ par myi byed yangs par myi byed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid
221b5('bum): 'dra bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// rang byang chub 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sa
221b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams 'du bar myi byed yangs par myi byed yangs par myi byed do// zhes bya ba bgyi bar 'du shesu gyu rang pa dang // bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
221b7('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brte nad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brte nad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtend/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la brte na
221b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brten da/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtend nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// tshor ba tshang yod par myi byed tshang / 
222a1('bum): myed par myi byed do/ 'du shes tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// 'du byed tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// rnam par shes pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad mye bar myi byed do// shes ra/ 
222a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// rna ba tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed// sna tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// lce tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi
222a3('bum): myi byed do/ lus tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// yid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// sgra tshad
222a4('bum): yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// dri tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// ro tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// reg tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do sa chos tshad
222a5('bum): yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad
222a6('bum): myed par myi byed do// sna'i rnam par shes tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes par tshad yod par myi byed
222a7('bum): tshad myed par myi byed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// 
222a8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus
222b1('bum): te reg pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad par myi byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad yod par/ 
222b2('bum): myi byed tshad yospyod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chud yod par myi byed chang med par myi byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshang ma long bar myi byed
222b3('bum): tshad med par myi byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad yod par myi byeng tshad myed par myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi bye'o// yid kyi 'dun
222b4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshad yod par myi byed chad med pa myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa'i khams chang yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed// chu'i khams tshad yod par myi
222b5('bum): byed chad myed par myi byed do// me'i khams chad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// rlung gi khams chad yod par myi byed/ tshad myed par myed byed/ nam mkha'i khams tshad yod par myi byed cha
222b6('bum): med par myi byed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad yod par myi byong chad med par myi byed do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni ma rig pa chang yod par myi byed tshang med par myi byed do// 'du byed chang yod par myi byed/ 
222b7('bum): tshad med par myi byed do// rnam par shes pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed/ mying dang gzugs chad yod par myi byed tshad myed par mi byed do// skye mched tshad yong bar myi byed chang myed par myi byed do/ 
222b8('bum): reg pa tshang yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// tshor ba tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// sred pa tshad yong par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// len pa chang yong par myi byed tshang myed par myi byed nga/ 
223a1('bum): sring pa chad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// skye ba che tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// rga shi tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ sbyin/ 
223a2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshang yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed pa/ 
223a3('bum): myi byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
223a4('bum): pa ni nang stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// / phyi stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// phyi/ nang stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// stong pa nyid
223a5('bum): stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// chen po stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// 'dus byas stong
223a6('bum): ba nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// thog ma dang / 
223a7('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad yod par mying byed tshad med par myi byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed/ tshad myed par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// 
223a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi phyed tshad med par myi byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed/ tshad med par myi byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par
223b1('bum): myi byed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med myi byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med
223b2('bum): par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshang ba yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi
223b3('bum): rkang pa rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// dbang po rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// stobs rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs
223b4('bum): tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed/ do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
223b5('bum): rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// bsam gtan rnams tshad yod par myi byed chad myed par myi byed do// tshad med pa/ rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// gzugs myed ni/ 
223b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad yod par myi byed chad med par myi byed ngo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnams par tha ra pa brgyad chad yod par myi byed chad med par myi byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
223b7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad myeng par myi byed do// dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pas chang yong bar myi byed chang med par myi skye
223b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnams par shes pa rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// gzugs kyi sgo rnams ched yod par myi byed tshang / 
224a1('bum): myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// 
224a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// snying rje chen po tshad yod par myi byed tshad myen par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
224a3('bum): tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// phyir myi 'ong
224a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do// rang byang chub tshad yod par myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// lam gi rje
224a5('bum): par shes pa nyid tshad yod par myi byed tshad med par myi byed do/ byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshad yod pa myi byed tshad myed par myi byed do// zhes bgyi bar 'du su gyur na/ 
224a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du shes su gyurang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// 
224a7('bum): 'phags pa// bam po// bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da / 
224a8('bum): chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtend / bsam gtan gi pha rob tu phyin pa la brtend/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu byinang pa la brtenang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyir/ 
224b1('bum): pa la brten du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brten / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa la brten shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang ni gzugs rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// tshor ba rgya chen por myi
224b2('bum): byeng rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 'du shes rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 'du byed rgya chen por mi byed rgya chung ngur m+b+hi byed do// rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi byed rgyu chung ngur myi byed // shes rab kyi pha ro// 
224b3('bum): tu phying ba ni myig rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// rnad rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// sA rgya chen por mi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// lce rgya chen por myi byed chung ngur myi byed do// lus rgya chen po
224b4('bum): rmyi byed rgya chung ngur gyi byed do/ yid rgya chen por myi byeng rgya / dung myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs dpor gyi byed rgya chung drur myits+tsha rjesgrargya chen por myi byed rje rlung du
224b5('bum): myi byed do/ dri rgyu chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do/ rorgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// reg rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngung myi byed do// chos rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed
224b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa rgya rnon por myi byeng rgyu chung ngur myi byed de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi byeng rgya chung ngur myi byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por rtse nga
224b7('bum): rtsa rlung du myi byed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya rlung rngu mo rnyed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi byed rgyu chung ngur m+b+hi byed / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya chen por myi byed
224b8('bum): ngur myi byed do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa
225a1('bum): ga rgyu chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// sgo'i 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pargya
225a2('bum): chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya
225a3('bum): chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rgya chen por myi byed rgyu chung ngur myi byed do// lho'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 
225a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus ti rig bA las byung ba'i rdo ba rgya chen por gyi byung rgya rlung drur myi byed do/ yang kyi 'dus ti ga pums byung ba'i/ tshor ba rgya chen por myi byed rtswa rlung ngur sti byed de/ swA rAH
225a5('bum): ts+tsha lams rgya chen po shrI rjing rgya chung du mi byed // mya ba pa'i 'bras rdzu pa hrI rlung tu chung ngu N+DI d+hing // ma po shes pa lang mas rten por gyi cing na chung du myi byud // par gyi
225a6('bum): na dri ga pa rgyun kyi cing na du kyiH/ ng+ge dpar gyi rnyeng tu chung ba ma rnyed // rna shes brgyachen sto gyi byed do// narlung de/ rdzi nga ga
225a7('bum): ri ba cing tu chung cu kyi rtse rtse mtshod gi che chen po gyi byeng tu chung chu ci rje ngo/ na brgya na cing gyi byeng tu chung ngu mi thong / tshun ri kyi byeng tu chung du thong ngo // 
225b1('bum): sred pa rgya che bar myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// len pa rgya che bor myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// srid pa rgya che por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// skye ba rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do / rga shi
225b2('bum): rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen por myi byed
225b3('bum): rgya chung ngur myi byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
225b4('bum): nga rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang ni nang stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// da phyi stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed to// phyi nang
225b5('bum): stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// chen po stong pa nyid che rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// don pa
225b6('bum): ba stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed do// rgya chung ngur myi byed do// mtha' las
225b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// dor ba med pa stong pa pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 
225b8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do
226a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur/ myi byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do/ 
226a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// yang dag par spong ba rgya che der
226a3('bum): myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// dbang po rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// stobs rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// 
226a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung/ dur myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni 'phags pa'i bden
226a5('bum): pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// bsam gtan rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// tshad med pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
226a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad rgya chen por myi byeng rgya chung ngur myi byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
226a7('bum): dgu rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid rgya chen por myi byang rgya chung ngur myi byad da/ dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// shes rab
226a8('bum): kyi ring tu phyin pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur mi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur gyi byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams rgya chen por gyi byeng rgya chung ngur mya byos
226b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mi de bzhin gshes pa'i spobs bcu rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// so so yangag par rig pa rnams rgya
226b2('bum): chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// snying rje chen po rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur
226b3('bum): myi byed do// rgyu tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rgya chen por myi byeng rgya chub
226b4('bum): ngudur myi byed do/ dgra bcom pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// rang byang chub rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung ngur myi byed do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid rgya chen por myi byed rgya chung
226b5('bum): dur myi byed do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rna rgya chen por myi byeng rgya chung ngur myi byed do// zhesabagyi bar 'du shes su gyu nang na/ bcom ldan 'das de lhur 'du/ 
226b6('bum): shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'ongs gal te gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po theg
226b7('bum): pA la gsar du zhugs pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la brten / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la brte nad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtend/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pal
226b8('bum): brtend/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brten/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la ni gzugs mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi bye/ 
227a1('bum): tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// 'du shes mthu' ma dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do/ 'du byed mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis pa/ 
227a2('bum): myi byed do// rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// rna ba mthu' dang ldan
227a3('bum): par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// sna mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// lce mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// lus mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu
227a4('bum): ma mchis par myi byed do// yid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// sgra mthu' dang
227a5('bum): ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// dri mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// ro mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// reg mthu' dang ldan
227a6('bum): par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// chos mthu' dang lan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig gyi rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi
227a7('bum): byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthu' ma dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa mthu' ca dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do
227a8('bum): rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' dang ma mchis par myi byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// yid kyi rnam par shes mthu' dang ldan par myi
227b1('bum): byed mthu' mchis par myi byed do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pAn+di myig gi 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthul
227b2('bum): ma mchis par myi byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// lus kyi 'dus
227b3('bum): te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg
227b4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis da par myi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba/ mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// sna'i
227b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byid mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed
227b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do/ srid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu ma mchis par myi byed do// shes rab
227b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sa'i khams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// chu'i khams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' dang ma mchis par myi byed do// me'i khams mthu' dang ldan par
227b8('bum): myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// rlung gi khams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// nam mkha'i khams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' dang ma mchis par myi byed do// rnam par
228a1('bum): shes pa'i khams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni ma rig pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// 'du byed
228a2('bum): mthu'as dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// rnam par shes pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// mying dang gzugs mthu' dang ldan myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byeda'o// 
228a3('bum): skye mched drug mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// reg pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// tshor ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// 
228a4('bum): sred pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// le nad pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// srid pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed de/ 
228a5('bum): skye ba mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// rga shi mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni/ sbyin pha rol tu phyi nang pa
228a6('bum): mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang
228a7('bum): ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang ba mthu' dang ldan pa
228a8('bum): myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// phyi stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthul
228b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' mchis par myi byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' ma mchis par myi byed do// chen po stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed
228b2('bum): mthu' myed par myi byed do / don dam pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
228b3('bum): mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' med par myi byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid mthul rtsa dang ldan par myi byed
228b4('bum): mthu myed par myi byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myed byed mthu' med par myi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu myed par myi byed do// chos thams cad stong
228b5('bum): pa nyid mthu dang ldan par myi byed mthu' med par myi byed de/ rang / gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi
228b6('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu med/ par myi byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthu' dang
228b7('bum): ldan par myi byed mthu myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams mthu' dang ldan
228b8('bum): par myi byed mthu' med par myi byed // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu med par myi byed do// dbang po rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu myed par myi byed do// stobs rnams mdzu/ 
229a1('bum): shag dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthu dang ldan pa myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthu dang ldan par myi byed/ 
229a2('bum): mthu' myed par myi byed do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// bsam gtan rnams mthu' deng ldan par myi byed mthu
229a3('bum): paramyi byed do / tshad myed pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
229a4('bum): pa ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad mthu dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed de mthu' myed par myi byed do// 
229a5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon/ pa myed pa mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams mthu
229a6('bum): dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams mthu dang ldan par myi byed mthu myed par myi byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// shes rab kyi/ 
229a7('bum): pa romang tu byi nang pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' byed par myi byed do// myi 'jigs bya bzhi mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myeng par myi byed do// so so yang dag par nga/ 
229a8('bum): ba bzhi mthu dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// snying rje chen po mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myeng par myi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya
229b1('bum): mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu myed par myi byed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu/ 
229b2('bum): byed par myi byed do/ byamyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthu' dang san par myi byed mthu' myed par myi byed de/ dgra bcom pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' med par myi byed do// rang byang chub mthu dang ldan pa di
229b3('bum): byed mthu' myed par myi byed do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid mthu' dang ldan par myi byid mthu med par myed byed do// byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthu' dang ldan par myi byed mthu' rtse
229b4('bum): par myi byed do zhes bgyi bar 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du shesu gyu rang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
229b5('bum): spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang gzug che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang
229b6('bum): tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang 'du shes che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bgying pa de ni/ shes rab
229b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang 'du byed che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
229b8('bum): mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rnam shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ 
230a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang myig che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rna ba che bar bgyid pa
230a2('bum): bam chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang sna che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang
230a3('bum): lce che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang lus che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras
230a4('bum): bu ma lags so// gang yid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma la gas so// gang gzugs che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid
230a5('bum): ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma la gas so// gang sgra che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ 
230a6('bum): gang de che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang re che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
230a7('bum): mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang reg che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang chos che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyi
230a8('bum): ba don shes rab kyi pha rosong tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang myig gi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyod pa'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha ro lo du phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras cu
230b1('bum): ma lags so// gang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang sna'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am
230b2('bum): chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang lce'i rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras
230b3('bum): bu ma lags so// gang lus kyi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang yid kyi rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa/ 
230b4('bum): 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun dpa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma dpar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
230b5('bum): phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi / rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang sna'i
230b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
230b7('bum): ro yod tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// grang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa che bar bgyid pa'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang yid kyi 'dus
230b8('bum): te reg pa las che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ gang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am
231a1('bum): chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
231a2('bum): pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang lce'i
231a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar bgyid pa
231a4('bum): 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthu dran pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes
231a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ gang sa'i khams che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shesar/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang chu'i
231a6('bum): khams che bar bgyod pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso// gang ma'i khams che bar bgyid pa'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i
231a7('bum): 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rlung gi khams che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang nam mkha'i khams che bar bgyid pa 'am chung ngar
231a8('bum): bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rnam par shes pa'i khams che bar bgyid ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bum lags pa
231b1('bum): gang ma rig pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang 'du byed che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
231b2('bum): pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rnam par shes pa che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang mying dang gzugs
231b3('bum): che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang skye mched drug che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
231b4('bum): tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang reg pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// 
231b5('bum): gang tshor ba che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ gang sred pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa den
231b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang le nad pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags
231b7('bum): so// gang srid pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang skye ba che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231b8('bum): pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang rga shi che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang sbyin
232a1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyi ba 'am chud par bgyid ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso// gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung
232a2('bum): byar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso// 
232a3('bum): gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma legaso// gang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar bgyid pa/ 
232a4('bum): 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang nang stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i
232a5('bum): 'bras bu ma lagaso/ gang phyi stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa/ 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so/ gang phyi nang stong pa nyid che bar
232a6('bum): bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
232a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so// gang chen po stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags/ gang don dam pa
232a8('bum): stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso// gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes
232b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso// gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am/ chung par bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma
232b2('bum): lags so// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso/ gang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
232b3('bum): che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lagaso// gang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa 'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
232b4('bum): tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid che bar bgyid pa'am chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes nga rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lag so// gang
